<Text: Lieutenant colonel is a rank of commissioned officer in the armies and most marine forces and some air forces of the world, above a major and below a colonel.>

Text: Lieutenant colonel:  The rank of lieutenant colonel is often shortened to simply "colonel" in conversation and in unofficial correspondence.

Text: Lieutenant colonel:  A lieutenant colonel is typically in charge of a battalion in the army.
